about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Your reliable partner in maritime medicine
about.description: The Medical Center of Maritime Safety has been operating since 2008 and is a medical institution licensed by the Ministry of Health of Ukraine.
about.certificates: Certificates are recognized by maritime administrations of many countries worldwide, confirming the high quality of our services and compliance with international standards.

countries.marshall: Marshall Islands, Panama, Cyprus, Denmark, Liberia, Namibia, Bahamas, Vanuatu (only with drug and alcohol testing), Cook Islands, Antigua and Barbuda.
countries.belize: Belize, Malta, Dominican Republic, Faroe Islands.

about.licenseText: Centre licensed by Ministry of Health of Ukraine.

belgianCertification.title: Belgian Certification
belgianCertification.description: The Medical Center provides certificates on the Belgian flag state form, as our doctor is officially approved by the Belgian Maritime Administration. This allows us to issue documents that meet all requirements of Belgium's healthcare system and are recognized by official authorities of this country.

zavyalov.name: Zavyalov Viktor Apollonovich
zavyalov.description: Experienced doctor in maritime medical certificate expertise. Specializes in seafarer medical examinations according to international standards.

professionalTeam.title: Professional Team
professionalTeam.description: Our doctors have many years of experience in maritime medicine and regularly improve their qualifications in accordance with international standards and requirements of maritime administrations.

certificates.title: Certificates and Accreditations
certificates.description: Our medical center has all necessary licenses and certificates to provide quality medical services to seafarers. All documents are recognized by maritime administrations worldwide and comply with international standards.

iso.title: Quality Management System ISO 9001:2015
iso.description: International quality management system standard confirming our commitment to continuous improvement of medical services and client satisfaction.

mlc.title: MLC 2006 Compliance Certificate
mlc.description: Document confirming our center's compliance with the Maritime Labour Convention 2006 requirements.

license.title: Medical Practice License
license.description: License from the Ministry of Health of Ukraine for medical practice, including conducting medical examinations for seafarers.

professional.title: Professional Certification
professional.description: Certificate of professional competency of medical personnel in conducting medical examinations for persons wishing to work on ships.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.description: Over many years of operation, we have accumulated significant experience and earned the trust of thousands of seafarers. Our certificates are recognized worldwide, allowing seafarers to work on vessels of various flags.

isoMlc.title: ISO / MLC 2006
isoMlc.description: The Center has implemented the requirements of the Maritime Labour Convention 2006 in our quality management system. We conduct annual internal audits and staff training.

iso.title: ISO 9001:2015
iso.description: Quality management system ensuring continuous improvement of medical services and compliance with international standards.

mlc.title: MLC 2006
mlc.description: Maritime Labour Convention 2006 - international standard for protecting seafarers' rights and ensuring safe working conditions.

protocols.title: Medical Protocols
protocols.description: Adherence to modern medical protocols and standards for conducting quality medical examinations of seafarers.

training.title: Staff Training
training.description: Regular training and professional development of medical staff according to the latest requirements and standards.

qualityStandards.title: Our Quality Standards
qualityStandards.description: The Medical Center of Maritime Safety adheres to the highest international quality standards in providing medical services. Our quality management system regularly undergoes audits and certification, guaranteeing professionalism and reliability of our services.

cooperation.title: Cooperation
cooperation.subtitle: Cooperation on mutually beneficial terms
cooperation.description: We strive for long-term partnerships based on mutual trust, professionalism, and mutual benefit for all participants in the maritime industry.
